statements: SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_data WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, wallet_address FROM cryptocurrency_data WHERE id < 50 ORDER BY wallet_address ASC
SELECT wallet_address, balance FROM cryptocurrency_data LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2
SELECT id, balance FROM cryptocurrency_data WHERE balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_data WHERE wallet_address LIKE '0x%'
SELECT wallet_address, balance FROM cryptocurrency_data WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY wallet_address ASC
SELECT id, wallet_address FROM cryptocurrency_data WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_data WHERE balance < 5000 AND wallet_address LIKE '0x%'
SELECT wallet_address, balance FROM cryptocurrency_data WHERE balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT id, wallet_address, encryption_key FROM cryptocurrency_data WHERE encryption_key IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, wallet_name, public_key FROM cryptocurrency_wallets;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT wallet_name, encrypted_private_key FROM cryptocurrency_wallets ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT sender_wallet_id, receiver_wallet_id, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_history WHERE sender_wallet_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cryptocurrency_wallets WHERE encrypted_private_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_wallets ORDER BY wallet_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT wallet_name, public_key FROM cryptocurrency_wallets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, wallet_name, public_key FROM cryptocurrency_wallets WHERE wallet_name LIKE '%BTC%';
SELECT sender_wallet_id, receiver_wallet_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT th.transaction_id, cw.sender_wallet_id, cw.receiver_wallet_id, th.amount, th.timestamp FROM transaction_history th JOIN cryptocurrency_wallets cw ON th.sender_wallet_id = cw.id;
SELECT * FROM public.users;
SELECT username, email FROM public.users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM public.users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM public.wallets WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM public.transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM public.users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM public.users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM public.users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM public.wallets WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT transactions.transaction_id, wallets.wallet_id, amount, timestamp FROM public.transactions JOIN public.wallets ON transactions.wallet_id = wallets.wallet_id ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM crypto_wallets;
SELECT id, wallet_address, encrypted_private_key FROM crypto_wallets;
SELECT public_key, wallet_address FROM crypto_wallets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username FROM wallet_users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM crypto_wallets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT wallet_address, public_key FROM crypto_wallets WHERE wallet_address LIKE '%abc%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM wallet_users WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND password_hash = 'hashed123';
SELECT tx_id, sender_wallet_id, receiver_wallet_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, access_time, access_type FROM access_logs WHERE access_type = 'login' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_encryption_keys
SELECT user_id, encryption_key FROM user_encryption_keys ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT wallet_id, user_id, wallet_address FROM wallet_data WHERE balance > 1000
SELECT log_id, sender_wallet, receiver_wallet, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT audit_id, action, description FROM audit_trail WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM user_encryption_keys
SELECT wallet_id, wallet_address, balance FROM wallet_data ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT sender_wallet, receiver_wallet, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_logs WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT audit_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE action LIKE '%login%'
SELECT user_id, access_time FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time
